name: medium hammer walker
description: One of the many models of robots employed shortly before the collapse of civilization. This one is equipped with a medium clamp and a jackhammer. medium spidery legs clink noisily against the ground.

name: medium wrecking walker
description: One of the many models of robots employed shortly before the collapse of civilization. This one is equipped with a motor, a set of chains, and a menacing bludgeon. medium spidery legs clink noisily against the ground.

name: medium saw walker
description: One of the many models of robots employed shortly before the collapse of civilization. This one is equipped with several motors and nasty saws. medium spidery legs clink noisily against the ground.

name: medium drill walker
description: One of the many models of robots employed shortly before the collapse of civilization. This one is equipped with a medium clamp, meant to hold prey into several powerful drills. medium spidery legs clink noisily against the ground.

name: medium blade walker
description: One of the many models of robots employed shortly before the collapse of civilization. This one is equipped with a medium, sharp blade attached to heavy duty flexible material, pulled taut by a powerful motor and held by heavy-duty pins..

name: medium jaw walker
description: One of the many models of robots employed shortly before the collapse of civilization. This one is equipped with a massive hydraulic jaw. medium spidery legs clink noisily against the ground.

name: medium flame walker
description: One of the many models of robots employed shortly before the collapse of civilization. This one is equipped with a massive hydraulic flame. medium spidery legs clink noisily against the ground.

name: medium exterminator walker
description: One of the many models of robots employed shortly before the collapse of civilization. This one is equipped with tanks of insecticidal gas and powerful pincers. medium spidery legs clink noisily against the ground.

name: medium flash walker
description: One of the many models of robots employed shortly before the collapse of civilization. This one is equipped with several hoses attached to a medium tank of flash and powerful pincers. medium spidery legs clink noisily against the ground.
